Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes certain school districts in Nassau county to enter into binding arbitration
Summary: Authorizes certain school districts in Nassau county to enter into binding arbitration.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to extending binding arbitration provisions to certain school districts
